Name: Blockus' Adventures
About the game: In this indie platformer you will push your reflexes to the limit. Jump through nine levels of pixelated madness to reach the final boss, The Octagon! Evade his drones along the way and hope to survive his hardest trials! Taking you through two different worlds and two special tower climb levels, Blockus' Adventures is sure to excite all, regardless of age or video game experience. Features: -Nine unique levels -Two unique worlds, each with their own challenges -Two special tower climb levels -100 collectible gems per level -Final boss level!
